caption: The man and a taxi driver get off the car. They have a conversation. The driver has a gun, and he pushed the man to get into a classroom. It’s night and there’re no people, only these two men. The have a conversation, the driver takes out two bottles, and in each of the bottle is a small drug. In put the bottles on the table. Meanwhile, a people in his house finds something on his computer and he has a phone call to somebody. In the classroom, the driver pushed one bottle to the man. And outside the classroom, the man who just has a phone call arrives.
